com.model.powerups

Class GunPowerups

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.model.Gun
      • com.model.powerups.GunPowerups
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FireRateGunPowerup, ShotgunPowerup, WheelPowerup

    public class GunPowerups
extends Gun
    Default powerup, specific powerups extend this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GunPowerups(GameLogic gameLogic)
      Creates a default Powerup for the gun.

    • Method Summary

      float getEffectTime()
      Returns the current effect time.
      void removeEffect()
      Declares a method that is implemented by the powerups.
      void setEffectTime(float effectTime)
      Sets effect time to value.
      void update()
      Decreases effect time as time passes so powerup can wear off.
